nodes.text: The High King's Guard was a monarchical institution on the Imzig homeworld of Couronne. Utris M'Toc, a former member of the High King's Guard, forcibly fled the planet after a bloody coup, eventually transitioning to a security position with the Bespin Wing Guard.

The High King's Guard was created for the Star Wars Insider 148 article "Rogues Gallery: The Cloud Wing Guards," published in March 2014. Contributor Kevin Beentjes developed the High King's Guard as part of the backstory for character Utris M'Toc of the planet Couronne.
